mapper.select: SELECT sys_menu.id, sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.menu_name, sys_menu.menu_icon, sys_menu.menu_path, sys_menu.menu_hidden, sys_menu.menu_cache, sys_menu.menu_status, sys_menu.menu_authority, sys_menu.menu_sort, sys_menu.view_name, sys_menu.view_path, sys_menu.active_menu_path, sys_menu.frame_flag, sys_menu.del_flag, sys_menu.create_by, sys_menu.create_time, sys_menu.update_by, sys_menu.update_time FROM sys_role_menu left join sys_menu on sys_role_menu.menu_id = sys_menu.id left join sys_role on sys_role_menu.role_id = sys_role.id left join sys_user_role on sys_role.id = sys_user_role.role_id WHERE sys_menu.del_flag = #{delFlag} and sys_menu.menu_type != #{menuType} and sys_menu.menu_status = #{menuStatus} and sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId}
